data.text: @karamballes It's quite obvious she's a disciple of UsForThem. Ignoring the elephant in the room is just their default behaviour.

@karamballes UK children are in danger from the very people appointed by this country to protect them, but used their position to make sure children are exposed to covid, without any protection. The audacity they also have to use excuses and dare to still talk to us.
@karamballes I mean it’s not like we don’t all know schools are actually magic wand factories, along with the covid repelling forcefield at the school gates.

@karamballes Ukraine's women sacrifice everything for the freedom of their children, while UK has a children commissioner and so many other Uk institutions who promote illness and death in children! At a national level!
@karamballes @SmallBigWord They have no interest in the children's safety and wellbeing!
@karamballes She's not 'failing to understand' she's purposefully avoiding. Who signs her pay cheques?

She says attendence is her priority, yet she's argued against the measures required to reduce infection rates required to keep kids in school

Fails to talk of the need to invest in supporting services, its vacuous 
https://t.co/xvjUNfxahj
